verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: an announcement about his summit meeting with Kim Jong Un] . It will be June 12 in the Southeast Asian island nation of Singapore .
President Trump made an announcement about his summit meeting with Kim Jong Un . It [V: will] be June 12 in the Southeast Asian island nation of Singapore .
President Trump made an announcement about his summit meeting with Kim Jong Un . [ARG1: It] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in the Southeast Asian island nation of Singapore] .
